page.title: 17DRAMA AND MUSIC IN HENFIELD.
page.content: There are many drama and music societies in Henfield. The Henfield Players and the Henfield and District Choral and Operatic Society produce several productions a year. Henfield Drama Group by James. I go to a Drama Group on a Saturday. It costs Â£1.25 an hour. We learn plays and poems. It is at 10 a.m. I am the oldest boy. There are four boys and seven girls. Oliver Rehearsals by Christopher. I was chosen to be in the musical "Oliver". I did an audition for singing. I was one of the three best boy singers. The second audition was for acting. I was not so successful but I was chosen to be in the chorus. We went to the Village hall for the first rehearsal. It was good because I had to do some singing. My Mum is Widow Corney and Dad Bill Sykes.
